Q: What is MOSDAC?
A: MOSDAC (Meteorological and Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre) is an ISRO portal for hosting weather, oceanographic, and climate data.

Q: Is the data free to access?
A: Yes, most data is freely accessible after registration.

Q: Which satellites contribute data?
A: INSAT-3D, INSAT-3DR, SCATSAT-1, Megha-Tropiques, Oceansat series.

Q: What file formats are used?
A: Data is available in HDF5, NetCDF, and GeoTIFF formats.
